title: Blackstone-Backed Company to Buy Stake in Media Firm Co-Founded by Will Smith and Jada Pinkett-Smith
sub_head: Firm led by former Disney executives Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs to pay about $60 million for more than 10% of Westbrook
body:
A firm led by two former Walt Disney Co. executives has agreed to buy a stake in Will Smith and Jada Pinkett-Smithâ€™s media company, people familiar with the matter said, the latest in a series of high-profile acquisitions for the Blackstone Inc.-backed entertainment venture.
The Blackstone-backed firm, which has yet to announce a name for itself and is run by former Disney executives Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs, is paying about $60 million to acquire more than 10% of Westbrook Inc., the people said.
